Take control of your health with Healthatize, the ultimate tool for making informed food choices. Whether youâ€™re a health enthusiast, parent, athlete, or someone managing a specific diet, Healthatize is here to help you quickly analyze the food you consume.

Key Features:

Instantly analyze food and drink products from popular stores.
Classify items as unprocessed, processed, or ultra-processed using the NOVA scale.
Get warnings on harmful ingredients like trans fats, high fructose corn syrup, and MSG.
Discover healthier, eco-friendly alternatives and reduce your environmental impact.
View nutritional breakdowns in easy-to-understand pie charts.
Identify vegan products and learn more about dietary recommendations.
Healthatize simplifies the complex world of food and nutrition, offering clear insights and actionable advice. Whether you want to avoid additives, improve your diet, or just be more conscious of what you eat, Healthatize is your go-to extension for healthier living.

Download now and start making better food choices today!
